parameters.name: seed

param_schema.title: Seed
param_schema.description: Random seed. Leave blank to randomize the seed

parameters.description: Random seed. Leave blank to randomize the seed

parameters.name: top_p

param_schema.title: Top P
param_schema.description: Default value for TTS is 0.9, and 0.8 for speech editing

parameters.description: Default value for TTS is 0.9, and 0.8 for speech editing

parameters.name: kvcache

param_schema.description: Set to 0 to use less VRAM, but with slower inference

parameters.description: Set to 0 to use less VRAM, but with slower inference

parameters.name: cut_off_sec

param_schema.title: Cut Off Sec
param_schema.description: Only used for for zero-shot text-to-speech task. The first seconds of the original audio that are used for zero-shot text-to-speech. 3 sec of reference is generally enough for high quality voice cloning, but longer is generally better, try e.g. 3~6 sec

parameters.description: Only used for for zero-shot text-to-speech task. The first seconds of the original audio that are used for zero-shot text-to-speech. 3 sec of reference is generally enough for high quality voice cloning, but longer is generally better, try e.g. 3~6 sec

parameters.name: left_margin

param_schema.title: Left Margin
param_schema.description: Margin to the left of the editing segment

parameters.description: Margin to the left of the editing segment

parameters.name: temperature

param_schema.title: Temperature
param_schema.description: Adjusts randomness of outputs, greater than 1 is random and 0 is deterministic. Do not recommend to change

parameters.description: Adjusts randomness of outputs, greater than 1 is random and 0 is deterministic. Do not recommend to change

parameters.name: right_margin

param_schema.title: Right Margin
param_schema.description: Margin to the right of the editing segment

parameters.description: Margin to the right of the editing segment

parameters.name: whisperx_model

param_schema.description: If orig_transcript is not provided above, choose a WhisperX model for generating the transcript. Inaccurate transcription may lead to error TTS or speech editing. You can modify the generated transcript and provide it directly to orig_transcript above

parameters.description: If orig_transcript is not provided above, choose a WhisperX model for generating the transcript. Inaccurate transcription may lead to error TTS or speech editing. You can modify the generated transcript and provide it directly to orig_transcript above

parameters.name: orig_transcript

param_schema.title: Orig Transcript
param_schema.description: Optionally provide the transcript of the input audio. Leave it blank to use the WhisperX model below to generate the transcript. Inaccurate transcription may lead to error TTS or speech editing

parameters.description: Optionally provide the transcript of the input audio. Leave it blank to use the WhisperX model below to generate the transcript. Inaccurate transcription may lead to error TTS or speech editing

parameters.name: stop_repetition

param_schema.title: Stop Repetition
param_schema.description: Default value for TTS is 3, and -1 for speech editing. -1 means do not adjust prob of silence tokens. if there are long silence or unnaturally stretched words, increase sample_batch_size to 2, 3 or even 4

parameters.description: Default value for TTS is 3, and -1 for speech editing. -1 means do not adjust prob of silence tokens. if there are long silence or unnaturally stretched words, increase sample_batch_size to 2, 3 or even 4

parameters.name: sample_batch_size

param_schema.title: Sample Batch Size
param_schema.description: Default value for TTS is 4, and 1 for speech editing. The higher the number, the faster the output will be. Under the hood, the model will generate this many samples and choose the shortest one

parameters.description: Default value for TTS is 4, and 1 for speech editing. The higher the number, the faster the output will be. Under the hood, the model will generate this many samples and choose the shortest one

parameters.name: target_transcript

param_schema.title: Target Transcript
param_schema.description: Transcript of the target audio file

parameters.description: Transcript of the target audio file

seed.description: Random seed. Leave blank to randomize the seed

kvcache.description: Set to 0 to use less VRAM, but with slower inference

stop_repetition.description: Default value for TTS is 3, and -1 for speech editing. -1 means do not adjust prob of silence tokens. if there are long silence or unnaturally stretched words, increase sample_batch_size to 2, 3 or even 4

sample_batch_size.title: Sample Batch Size
sample_batch_size.description: Default value for TTS is 4, and 1 for speech editing. The higher the number, the faster the output will be. Under the hood, the model will generate this many samples and choose the shortest one
